2) Enable secure login (V2): you sign a message (not a transaction).
3) Then click Dashboard.

The dashboard is reserved for members with Session OK.
Enable secure login (V2) first:

dashboard.title: Members Area
dashboard.intro: You are connected via V2 ULTRA: readable message signature + nonce + server session (httpOnly cookie).
dashboard.beginnerDashboardHint:
You are already “connected” here (Session OK).
The session comes from a message signature (no transaction).
If the session expires: go back to /community and enable secure login again.
dashboard.security3: ✅ Session: httpOnly cookie (not readable by JS).
dashboard.security4: ⚠️ Swap = transaction (normal). You always see the transaction in Phantom.
dashboard.questsHint:
Quests reward activity.
Follow the steps, then validate.
Some quests may require an on-chain action later (swap/hold), but not the login.
dashboard.rewardsHint:
Here you see your rewards / status.
CSV export or “admin” actions may exist: they are reserved to allowlisted wallets.

dashboard.identityNote: This wallet proved ownership via message signature. No private key is shared.
dashboard.help1: • If “Session OK” disappears: go back to /community and reconnect V2.

progress.title: Beginner path
progress.subtitle: 4 simple steps • goal: avoid mistakes

step1.title: 1) Install Phantom
step1.subtitle: Browser extension. Store your seed offline.
step1.coachText:
Never share your seed phrase.
Avoid unknown links.
When ready: connect the wallet on the site (step 2).

step2.title: 2) Connect the wallet
step2.subtitle: Click the wallet button (top). Wallet connect ≠ transaction.

step3.title: 3) Enable secure login (V2)
step3.subtitle: Sign a message (free) → Session OK → access Dashboard.
step3.coachText:
You sign a readable message (free).
No transaction.
If Phantom shows a transaction here: STOP.

step4.title: 4) First test (small amount)
step4.subtitle: Swap SOL→SHUI or LP: normal transaction. Start small.

progress.reminder: Reminder: login = signed message • swap/LP = transaction.

step1.title: Next step: connect the wallet
step1.body:
Click the wallet button on the top right (Phantom / Solflare).
Wallet connect ≠ secure login: here you only reveal your address.
No transaction is required to connect to the site.

step2.title: Next step: enable secure login (V2)
step2.body:
Your wallet is connected. Now enable V2.
You will sign a readable message (signMessage) — NOT a transaction.
If Phantom shows a transaction here: STOP.
step2.coachText:
Goal: create a server session.
You sign a readable message (free) — no transaction.
Then: “Session OK” appears, and /dashboard becomes accessible.

step3.title: Next step: go to the dashboard
step3.body:
Session OK ✅
The dashboard contains Quests / Rewards.
You can track your points and monthly status.

step4.title: Next step: complete a quest
step4.body:
Pick an easy quest to start.
V1: off-chain claim (no transaction).
Later: some proofs may be on-chain (swap/hold), but not the login.

guide.tip1: Tip: this guide explains “what to do” + “what to sign”. Swaps/LP will always require a transaction (normal).

safety.title: Before you start (security)
safety.b1: A wallet is your vault. NEVER share your secret phrase (seed).
safety.b2: Site login = message signature (not a transaction).
safety.b3: Swap / Buy / Sell = transaction (normal: Phantom will show it).
safety.b4: If a pop-up asks for a transaction when you only wanted to log in: STOP.
safety.warning: Golden rule: no legitimate site will ever ask for your seed phrase.

wallet.title: Create a wallet (Phantom)
wallet.b3: Store the secret phrase offline (paper / safe).
wallet.b4: Enable a PIN / biometrics on your device.
wallet.warning: Lose your seed = lose access to your funds. Nobody can recover it for you.

secureLogin.title: Enable secure login (V2)
secureLogin.b2: You sign a readable message (NOT a transaction).
secureLogin.b3: The site creates a server session (httpOnly cookie).
secureLogin.warning: If Phantom shows a transaction here: it’s abnormal → do not accept.

buy.title: Buy / Swap SHUI (beginner)
buy.b1: The integrated swap (Jupiter) lets you exchange SOL → SHUI.
buy.b2: A swap = transaction: Phantom will ask you to sign.
buy.b4: Always verify the token (mint) before confirming.

lp.title: Understand liquidity (LP)
lp.b1: LP means you deposit 2 tokens (e.g., SOL + SHUI) into a pool.
lp.b2: You receive an LP token representing your share.
lp.b4: Know about impermanent loss (it can move).
lp.warning: LP is not “guaranteed”. Do it only if you understand the concept.

dashboard.title: Dashboard & Quests (rewards)
dashboard.b1: Quests give off-chain points (to reward activity).

next.title: What comes next (public vision)
next.b1: Later: simpler swaps (SOL/SHUI, USDC/SHUI, etc.) with more liquid pools.
next.b2: We will add a more guided beginner path (steps + images + mini-coach).
next.b3: Goal: make SHUI usable for newcomers too.
